outcome.title: Distance in the plane
outcome.description: I can use the Pythagorean Theorem to compute distances in the plane.

outcome.title: Circles and equations
outcome.description: I can write an equation for a circle with a given center and radius. Conversely, I can identify the center and radius from an equation which defines a circle.

outcome.title: Trigonometry and the unit circle
outcome.description: I can use the unit circle to compute values of trigonometric functions.

outcome.title: Trigonometry in right triangles
outcome.description: I can compute lengths of sides and measures of angles using trigonometry in right triangles.

outcome.title: Trigonometric Identities 1
outcome.description: I can manipulate and/or simplify expressions involving the "Pythagorean" identities.

outcome.title: Trigonometric Identities 2
outcome.description: I can use the "angle sum" formulas to compute values of trigonometric functions.

outcome.title: Logarithm Rules
outcome.description: I can use "logarithm rules" to manipulate expressions and solve equations involving logarithms.

outcome.title: Basics for sine and cosine
outcome.description: I can sketch graphs involving the sine and cosine functions and correctly interpret notation for trigonometric functions.

outcome.title: Inverse Functions 1
outcome.description: I can describe, compute, and sketch the inverse of a given algebraic function.

outcome.title: Inverse Functions 2
outcome.description: I can describe, compute, and sketch inverse functions for common transcendental functions.

outcome.title: Analyzing transcendental functions
outcome.description: I can make a sign chart for an expression involving common transcendental functions.

outcome.title: Similar Triangles
outcome.description: I can use similarity to compute lengths in the plane.

outcome.title: Solving Equations
outcome.description: I can manipulate expressions and solve equations by successively performing multiple algebraic steps.
